en: You hunker down as the battle rages. I'm sorry, Sasha. I'm [color=STEEL_BLUE]not as brave as you[/color].
"The [color=CRIMSON]terrorist attack[/color] has been repelled! The ringleaders are being [color=DARK_VIOLET]processed[/color] as we speak."
Chief Yukon drags in resistance members in chains, Sasha among them. "These [color=CRIMSON]traitors[/color] will face [color=DARK_VIOLET]final processing[/color]."
Sasha catches your eye. Despite her bruises, her gaze holds [wave amp=15 freq=2][color=CHARTREUSE]no judgment, only sadness[/color][/wave].
You've survived by keeping your head down, but [pulse freq=3][color=GOLD]at what cost?[/color][/pulse] As [color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color] production wafts from the plant, your stomach turns.
Perhaps there's still a chance from the inside. Or maybe you're just easing your conscience.
You [tornado radius=3 freq=2][color=CHARTREUSE]abandon your post[/color][/tornado] and race toward the fighting. The time for caution is over.
[pulse freq=3][color=GOLD]Prove you're with us![/color][/pulse] How do you know Sasha?
[color=CHARTREUSE]The roots grow deep![/color] I'm from the checkpoint, Sasha recruited me!
They're taking her to the processing plant right now. We need to hurry!
The doors blast open, revealing the [wave amp=25 freq=3][color=CRIMSON]horrific truth[/color][/wave] - grinding machines, conveyors carrying potatoes to their doom.
At the end of one belt - Sasha and others [color=CRIMSON]bound helplessly[/color]. Supervisor Russet stands at the controls.
[color=RED]YOU![/color] I should have known you were one of them! Back away or I start the processor!
[color=STEEL_BLUE]The resistance leader steps forward, weapon trained on Russet.[/color] Not another step, Russet. Your hands where I can see them.
[color=CRIMSON]Russet's eyes dart between you and the resistance leader, sweat beading on his brow.[/color] You think you've won? This facility is the foundation of Spud!
The foundation of suffering. [pulse freq=3][color=CHARTREUSE]It ends today.[/color][/pulse]
[color=STEEL_BLUE]Sasha struggles against her bindings on the conveyor belt
column3: looking up as she sees you.[/color] You... you actually came!

en: [tornado radius=3 freq=2][color=CRIMSON]"Russet
column3: you monster! You'll pay for every life you've taken!"[/color][/tornado]

en: [wave amp=15 freq=2][color=STEEL_BLUE]"This... this is what they've been doing? It's worse than I imagined..."[/color][/wave]
[color=CHARTREUSE]"Sasha! Thank the roots you're alive! Hold on
[color=CRIMSON]You charge toward Russet, fists clenched, barely held back by the resistance fighters.[/color] Every potato that came through my checkpoint... how many did you...
Easy! We need him alive to testify. [color=STEEL_BLUE]The leader keeps their weapon trained on Russet.[/color] Save your anger for the courts.
[color=STEEL_BLUE]You stagger back, hand covering your mouth, taking in the full horror of the machinery.[/color] I stamped their papers... I sent them here...
[color=CHARTREUSE]You didn't know. None of us did.[/color] That's why we're here now. Focus!
[color=CHARTREUSE]You rush to the conveyor
column3: working frantically at Sasha's restraints.[/color] I'm here. I'm not leaving without you.

en: [color=CHARTREUSE]Sasha's eyes shine with tears and hope as your hands work the knots.[/color] I knew you'd come. I never doubted you.
[color=STEEL_BLUE]The leader forces Russet to his knees at gunpoint.[/color] Tie him up. Make sure he watches what comes next.

[color=CHARTREUSE]Freed from her bonds, Sasha wastes no time, redirecting the facility cameras.[/color] [color=YELLOW]People of Spud! This is Root Reserve! They've been feeding us to each other![/color]
[color=CHARTREUSE]Sasha takes your hand, intertwining her fingers with yours.[/color] You came back for me. Whatever happens next... we face it together.
[color=STEEL_BLUE]Sasha watches you carefully, seeing the fury still burning in your eyes.[/color] Channel that fire. We'll need it for what comes next.
[color=STEEL_BLUE]Sasha places a gentle hand on your shoulder.[/color] The guilt isn't yours to carry. You're here now. That's what matters.
[color=CHARTREUSE]We did it. The truth is out there now.[/color] We have a future to build!
